website_summaries.verdict: This wall mount range hood stands out for its good looks and reasonable price, but its performance is iffy.
pros: Affordable, yet offers ultra modern looks thanks to the tempered glass visor and stainless steel construction
Earns praise for its "expensive" looking design
Filters are stainless steel and dishwasher safe
cons: Although it's rated at 460 CFM, some owners aren't satisfied with the suction it delivers

customer_reviews.title: poor assembly - returning it
customer_reviews.text: Upon unpacking the item we immediately noticed that the hood was not sealed. Its back- and top panels had visible gaps. Although the suction seemed adequate, we will be returning it due to the poor body assembly and anticipated air/grease leaks, as well as inadequate smoke filtering.
customer_reviews.author: practicalOne

customer_reviews.title: Now that I am doing my own, I have chosen to go with a Cosmo!
customer_reviews.text: For years I've been installing range hoods during a kitchen remodel. Now that I am doing my own, I have chosen to go with a Cosmo product. It is for me, by far, a well-made product that stands out far from the others in value. The features are nicely thought out with quality in mind. It is functionally superb and appealing as well, the mounting methods and hardware included makes this possible. I would highly recommend this range hood to anyone! I will post pictures soon when all is completed and in addition, more details of its use of effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: hankster169Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Use rigid duct tubing when installing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is good and the value is great, but whatever you do, make sure that you use rigid duct tube when installing and trash the flexible tube that it comes with!!! It’s rubbish!! If you use it, you will end up with noise from the range hood that’s compared to jet engines in your ears!!! No one can stand that, at least not me!! There you go, you’re forewarned! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Z. Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a range hood while remodeling an old house. AFTER we got started putting it in, we realized there was a large wire running right where we needed to go thru the ceiling. Found that this could be ductless and ordered the charcoal filters, problem solved. It looks nice and works great. We were leary of ductless after having a microwave/hood fan that was ductless. This one works! Very happy with our purchase and have recommended to others. Instructions were 😒, but a quick call to the company answered our question of where the small rubber pads were to be screwed in. Turns out, there are already screws in the spots. Very good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: kelmc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I had been searching for the right hood to complement our style. We thought we would have to spend hundreds of dollars or even a couple thousand to get the quality we received with this hood. It exhausts great and looks amazing over our new range. I highly recommend their products.
customer_reviews.author: VinceHollaway

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good
customer_reviews.text: I spent over $10,000.00 "freshening up" my kitchen and about $175.00 on this product. What do people say when they see my new kitchen? Wow, that range hood looks great. I have to make them aware that everything else in the kitchen is new too.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: Well , this was a project on itself but well worth it. It has a great suction, usually keeping it at 2 and using 3 for frying. Sucks all the heat and helps keep kitchen cool. Great look and matches with everything. Size was accurate. the most difficult part was the top chimney , flushing it to the roof was a bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: make sure to purchase the correct duct size for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great product with a quiet but powerful motor. It came with all the parts you need for installation but I was expecting a spacer for the main frame hookup (to match the supplied rubber bumper for the lower part. The description says, "Ducted Wall Mount Range Hood for up to a 8.5 Ft. Ceiling", but I actually had to trim the outer chute by 4 inches. I also had to reduce the kitchen's duct size from 7 to 6 inches. Nevertheless, I'm happy with how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This range hood has good power, was relatively easy to install, and looks great. We needed to shorten (cut off) the duct cover to fit under our 1846 ceiling height, but that wasn't terribly difficult and worked fine. Only a couple of negatives: - the control buttons are not quite as "positive" as one might want, but work all right; - the instructions have absolutely nothing in them about how to hook up the power, i.e. locate an outlet for the plug, or whether it can be hardwired in; and, - there is nothing about securely fastening the main vent/blower unit to the wall, though if one looks there are 2 holes for screws in the back panel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Piece came damaged during shipping. Almost unable to install vent guards from shipping damage to main vent body. Motor has a wobble or obtained a wobble from the shipping damage and makes loud grinding noise anytime fan is turned on, so unable to review suction power. Light is a good work light or night light. Other then what I assume is purely damage related, the piece looks of good quality and really adds that finishing touch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo Range Hoods are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Received the unit on time, no defects. Easy to Install looks great. Had a small issue with the unit called customer service and Chris was very helpful and friendly. He solved my issue right away. I bought the unit because I needed 633 CFM and the COS-63175S was rated for 760 CFM. So far so good. I read reviews about the noise level, to be honest it's not noisy at all. Any hood you purchase must have noise or it's not powerful enough to do its job. I would highly recommend Cosmo hoods, they have a wide selection and will look great in anyone's home.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with exhaust unit
customer_reviews.text: It is stainless, but a lighter gauge than your more expensive exhaust units, I can live with that. Install was very easy, even with lath and plaster walls and ceiling. 1930s cottage. New install , cut 6 1/4 in. hole in ceiling. Comes with accordion type aluminum, thin gauge exhaust duct, maybe 6ft long. I changed it to a sheet metal duct system. It would probably would have worked ok, but I’m not a big fan of it. Directions are very straight forward. Suction is great. It looks great. We’re happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great look & strong CFM
customer_reviews.text: This range not only looks great but is also very easy to install. The strong CFM and easily removable filter are a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: TimH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stainless steel hood for remodel job
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great hood, the internal filters are a bit pricey and not easy to find, but you probably can live without them and this hood can be vented externally (with included kit) as well as internally. Nice stainless grease filters, LED lighting and software, it was a bit difficult to install as the top must be fitted into the hood, so I would recommend two persons to make this easier. Lastly, the price is amazing for the features and quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: pokeyzon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek modern design and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "Cosmo 63175S Wall Mount Range Hood with 760 CFM Ductless Convertible Duct, Ceiling Chimney-Style Over Stove Vent, LED Light, Permanent Filter, 3 Speed Fan, 30 inches, Stainless Steel". My contractor installed it so I can't review on the install part. But do note, it does come with an plug in cord for electrical, and its 6 inch exhaust pipe, so if you have 4 inch exhaust pipes, need to get a converter pipe, which has pretty inexpensive. Functionality wide, it was very nice and strong, really love the 3 speed. Light is night and bright, not blue like other reviews I have read.
customer_reviews.author: YQ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. Our only complaint was that the ducting for the two pieces of hood was difficult to connect together. The lip to hold the two pieces together is too short to securely hold one side while screwing the other side together. It finally worked, but not without some "words" from the contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love it. Works well. A little noisy.
customer_reviews.text: I had my hood installed by my contractor and his electrician. It seemed to give them a hard time but they got it up and they loved it, as do I. Mine does not exhaust to the outside which makes it noisy on level 2 and really noisy on level 3. My contractor is going to come back and convert it to exhaust outside. He says that will make it less noisy.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyBroad

customer_reviews.title: Weak and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Noisy and not strong suction. On high setting, it suctioned some of the steam and smell but you can clearly see it is not strong enough to suck the steam so part of the front of the glass is all steamed up.
customer_reviews.author: Koobiidoobii

customer_reviews.title: Great Design & Suction
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, lighting & design. The only issue I had was during our remodel install the vent/sleeve was tricky to pull up and to connect. I would purchased this product again. If you are going ductless don’t forget the filters are sold separate. Not a loud product & as for cleaning I do not know I placed this in my rental home.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haapapuro

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced fan causing loud vibrations.
customer_reviews.text: Bought July 2019 and just had the chance to have it installed. To late to ask for refund or exchange. Contractor thinks it is defective, as chimney did not connect properly to other pieces. . Fan unit is unbalanced and causes excessive noise/vibrations. Not sure we will be able to use it in our apartment. Was really excited. It had just the right look we were going for.
customer_reviews.author: Germaine Andino

customer_reviews.title: Nice! And cheap
customer_reviews.text: So fancy! This is such a nice looking vent. I can’t believe how ritzy I feel with the help of a boojie vent hood. Lol. Excellent price. Much cheaper than anything remotely similar at Lowe’s or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: The unit we bought could either be vented through the chimney or become Ductless, we chose Ductless
customer_reviews.text: Needed a vent system for over our stove. Which we chose a ductless style vent as the old chimney behind the stove was not in very good shape. Wife loves it, three speeds for the fan, light system illuminates extremely well to stove top Surface, and she loves the clean look of the stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Harry B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quiet and elegant Cosmo Range Hood COS-63175S
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about the Cosmo Wall Mount Range Hood model COS-63175S is how quiet it is. I can actually hear the TV while I'm cooking! I also love that it has LED lights instead of the hot halogen bulbs from the past. And I like the stainless steel filters that won't get all smelly like the mesh ones. The unit is elegant looking and compact and lightweight. The unit was packed very securely in a strong box with plenty of styrofoam protection. I'm very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucina

customer_reviews.title: No more false Fire Alarms!
customer_reviews.text: Love our new Cosmo range hood. Shopped around at Lowe’s and Home Depot, online on Wayfair, Houzz, Costco and this by far was the most economical yet efficient hood on the market. The suction power to price ratio far exceeded our expectations and installation was a breeze for these amateur DIYers. Our fire alarm has not gone off in even the smokiest bacon/ fried salmon/ seared steak scenarios. I found an open box deal on Amazon so price was even better! Do your research- you will be coming back to Cosmo every time.
customer_reviews.author: clarissa a peppin

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are terrible
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were awful. Go straight to YouTube. This thing kicked my ass installing and I am usually pretty good with this kind of thing. Also the color balance on the lights is nasty. Its a low price unit and I guess you get what you pay for. But it looks fantastic once up on the wall. It’s not bad for just a little over $200
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quility / price
customer_reviews.text: I just received and unpacked. It looks to be a good quality stainless steel. It looks nice.Tested suction on high it is a little noisy on high speed, med speed not so bad, low speed quite. The test was done without vent piping, which will quite sound down even more. Once installed will write another review
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my new kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a highly rated hood vent! It looks fabulous. I haven't ran it yet, but after looking high and low for a quiet running and classic looking hood vent at an affordable price, this is the pick!! This is the product where function, looks, and value collide!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Keller

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We updated our kitchen and needed a range hood that was both functional and looked great. This was the one! Very good suction power and led lighting really lights up the cooktop. Also very easy to mount. Well pleased with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Happy overall
customer_reviews.text: We ran into a bit of an issues receiving the range hood initially, but amazon sorted it out thankfully so that we could install it in time. The look of the hood is exactly what we were looking for. Suction is reasonable, though I wish the cover was a little thicker. Overall happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wang

customer_reviews.title: "Skeptical"
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product but once installed my inhibitions were put to rest. It was easy to install and it works like a charm. I did have to contact the seller to purchase the charcoal filters but once they arrived it works perfectly. Amazon should put a little not in the packaging if you are going to use the exhaust fan in a non-vent to the outside manner.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Schill

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice product
customer_reviews.text: We got this wall mount range installed a month ago and so far we are pleased with the performance of this range. It is modern looking and has good suction power. The LED touch panel works as expected and the under range LED lights are handy. This range has three fan settings. The highest setting can get little louder but it also provides the most suction power which could be required for heavy cooking. Overall, no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mandeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design, Easy to Operate and 4/5 to Install
customer_reviews.text: Overall Verdict; Excellent quality product, not difficult to install (be prepared to use your brain) and a visually pleasing addition to my stove. It comes with the AC plug but is easy enough to switch to a hard wired to hide wires. Touch functions are a HUGE plus, the light is perfectly bright. 3 speed modes, timer shut down and excellent suction. If you're looking at range hoods, then look no further. This has much more customization then it appears and well certainly suit your needs and more.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this in my garage kitchen. I had a cavalier that stopped working and was unable to find parts. While it's not the same quality as the old one, it does as good a job and a little quieter. I bought this from the warehouse, I could find no flaws with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Hood Oven for Price Point
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the price point of this range hood. It’s sleek looking, was easy to install and does the job. It’s got a great soft touch control panel and three fan speeds. We replaced an over oven microwave and the noise is the same as our former GE microwave; not aggressive at all.
customer_reviews.author: TwinFlower

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to install, google a bit and take your time and it'll be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished installing, looks and works well. There's a You-Tube video out there that was helpful, instructions rather sparse. Mine was on top of glass tile which made it a bit more of a challenge. Only thing that I dislike is the light's color, Its too blue for me. I prefer a warmer color. Other than that, good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: We just recently remodeled our kitchen and decided to add this over our stove. It looks great and seems to work fine. I haven't cleaned the filters yet but I'm sure that it isn't to hard.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Klintworth

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you need an extention for 9-10ft ceiling
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product in Sept and tried to buy the extension directly from Cosmos. They kept telling me it will be available soon. it's been more than 5 weeks and it's not available. I wish I returned it and bought a different one from a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Husam

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty. I like the overall look of it, but when the fan is on high the thin metal actually moves, I try to keep it on a lower setting. It gives off good light and I like the timer aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Selecting the Carbon Filters was difficult
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to purchase the carbon filters at my initial order. I was instructed to receive the package, collect the serial number of the hood, then order the filter based on the serial number. This suggests to me that the filter was changed mid-production run and there are different styles of filters based upon the serial number sequence of the hood. Maybe in the future, when the old style filters are phased out, the filter can just be included or specified for the ease of customer ordering?
customer_reviews.author: William B. Schwab

customer_reviews.title: False Statements about unit.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE, says unit is ductless converts to ducted... not true. You have to order charcoal filters and install them... they are not included. COULD NOT get Cosmo to answer the help line, 5 calls, 2 messages...still nada. Called Amazon, will take it down, box it up and return tomorrow. Love Amazon , easy return. Stay away from cosmo.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Good product for home cook
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Straight forward installation. We bought this 36 inch wall mounted vent over 32 inch slid in oven range. We were happy with the choice we made. Good ventilation although a bit noisy buy we can tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No protection tape on the front and it had deep scratches
customer_reviews.text: I like the hood vent but when I took it out of the box it has a couple deep scratches on the front, it did not have protective tape on the front
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA ANN WORSTELL

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install and very Economical
customer_reviews.text: My old Range Hood gave up and I was worried how I was going to replace and install this new one (never done one before). But was fairly easy and instructions were clear. Only thing am worried about is the touch screen and will it last in the longer run. I would be happy if it works well for the 5 years that its warranted for considering the price of this one compared to other in same suction and size range. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Muthu

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This Cosmo Fan made a great addition to our recently remodeled kitchen. It looks beautiful next to our chosen backsplash and we our constantly complimented on our choice. It was easy to install and very quiet as compared to what it replaced. At this point we could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: wpltman

customer_reviews.title: It does not seem to do much
customer_reviews.text: Whenever we really generate a lot of steam or smoke on the cooktop, it does not flow into the hood, or at least a lot of it does not go up there. You can see the steam or smoke going left or right of the hood. It does make a lot of noise and we know something must be happening because grease does wind up in the grease tray, but we often have to open the windows when cooking on the cooktop, which is not really what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Aesthetically...however...
customer_reviews.text: I had seen this same fan on different sites and in different stores for 60-100 $ more. The value was great. What I don't like is that the clock is on military time and can’t be changed! Aesthetically though it’s very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks way more expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Such a great find & buy! These are a lot more pricey at Lowe’s & we were going to have to wait 4 weeks! Easy to mount as well! Very sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hood, not loud at all!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not loud at all! It’s very powerful! Looks great arrived timely and wasn’t bad to install for my contractors!
customer_reviews.author: sirBrently

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Our kitchen remodel is nearly complete with the arrival of the Ductless hood. Thank you for making our first remodel look amazing. I also contacted customer service for a brief understanding of the set up. They were fast to answer, easy to understand. And a pleasure to work with. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this range hood while replacing the backsplash in our kitchen and couldn't be happier! Even at it's highest setting it is much quieter than a microwave and it looks great! The lights are a bright white and the filters look easy to clean. I purchased this based on reviews online and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sleek. Modern
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple, modern and elegant hood. Shipped well. Working on installing!! Cannot wait to turn it on. I can update once it's up and running.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Unobtrusive
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's not as massive as most hoods and looks modern and clean. The buttons are not great (really junky actually) and so it doesn't have great functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing the OTR microwave with this kitchen hood. The hood is not heavy at all. It was easy to install. I had a friend who helped to hold it while I installed the wall mount screws. Materials is a bit flimsy though.
customer_reviews.author: Valla

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, we searched and researched before buying and we are glad we chose Cosmo Appliances. Looks great and you can feel the quality of the product. The suction power is very strong and the LED lights and digital display are a nice touch of elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful hood. Easy to install, easy to clean. Sleek and modern. Pardon our kitchen, still in midst of renovation.
customer_reviews.author: RN29414

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money spent. We had to make some modifications to fit the recirculating filter, but we have tools on hand to perform the task and was easy for my husband to modify on his band saw. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amber schnorr

customer_reviews.title: Ductless
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this unit is NOT ductless. Installation was pretty easy but after I installed it there was a very loud humming sound from the baffling grates. I then realized that there were no charcoal filters for this model which is when I found out this particular model is only for use ducted. Amazon was great and accepted the return.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and works great. Loud but then everyone I talk to says theirs are loud too and different brands.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi ma

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my new kitchen and it looks really nice. It adds a more modern style to my kitchen and makes it look sleek. The hood also works well. There are various settings for the fan to choose from and the noise level is comfortable. Easy to use and I also like the clock feature and lights on the fan hood. Very happy with the product so far. I have not clean the filters yet and I hope it will be an easy task.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Beware of false advertising
customer_reviews.text: We used this range hood in an Air B & B we upfit in our home. Has great suction but it advertised that is was the unit easily converted to be exhaustless, those directions were not available nor did the manufacturer provide carbon filter for the promised conversion.
customer_reviews.author: Adeeb Fakhoury

customer_reviews.title: I think this hood is much better than many of the other hoods we found for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well! I think this hood is much better than many of the other hoods we found for more than double at the home stores. Plus it has enough air volume movement to be properly up to code with our more powerful gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: NICE UNIT!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install. Mostly due to the light weight of hood. Works like a charm. Vents very well and is not noisy at all, even compared to cheapo unit I too out. I like this unit much more than old one. Plus the lights, tho a little blueish, are bright enough to see with. And there is a clock, kinda a extra bonus for free.
customer_reviews.author: Glen  V

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just now getting installed. Works great love the flex duct it is 6" and fairly long.allows the dog leg around joist.upper housing is approx 12. Included wall anchors are not for sheetrock. I used 1/4 " short Molly bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas_danco

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation, especially in a small space.
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, we choose this Cosmo range hood based upon specs and reviews. We have a very small space to work with however this unit fit perfectly. We had to trim some off the chimney however it was an easy task. This is a very powerful hood and it is the first time we had one that actually vented outside. Wow, what a difference. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: biff

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product seems nice out of the box but has plug for wall outlet. Had to cut that off and hardwire (minus 1/2 star for that). Lights are dim and white light (minus 1 star for that combo). Fan is also extremely loud on high (minus 1/2 star for that)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Conley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. It looks and works great and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: JHale

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vent hood to replace another that we didn't like. It was easy to install and looks stylish. So far, we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B Wooley

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, a little on the loud side.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and quality of this range hood. It was easy to install and works great. It is just a little on the loud side when operating at full power. (It is difficult to have a conversation around it when on.) Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maggue

customer_reviews.title: take tour time assembling chimney see what best works for u.
customer_reviews.text: liked the update it brought to the kitchen looks good with all the cabinet work I've done so far. disliked rhe assembly portion of the last piece on chimney, should've put top I n first then middle piece dented it a little.up by cieling. but overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David Wawrzyniak

customer_reviews.title: Look and performance are stunning
customer_reviews.text: The look and performance of this hood is great. We loved it and still love it. Pros: - Looks elegant - High performance - Easy to clean - Great price value Cons: - Duct cover is not easy to mount - Buttons sometimes don't respond immediately
customer_reviews.author: Atheer Alsaadi

customer_reviews.title: Good but buttons won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price, my only complaint is that I can’t get it to work when I press the buttons, I thought maybe it was disconnected or something but then when I was cleaning it, it turned on... so I guess it works just not always. Still looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my new hood! It looks amazing against the handpainted tile and new cabinets. It is a wonderful addition to my new kitchen and looks and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Linn M.S. Ed.

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my new kitchen, it works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Variety, Quality and Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t believe I could complete our kitchen remodel with a “FAN tastic” wall mounted hood over the range! Best price of course and got it THE NEXT DAY! Yeah... big smiles here!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very noisy - defective
customer_reviews.text: It looks fancy but this range hood is very loud. The installation was pretty straightforward but unfortunately It came with a defective light and multiple dents on the chimney cover
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: dent
customer_reviews.text: took awhile for contractor to install with covid, when it was opened looked like it was previously opened. Item dented. Not happy but to late to return. Poor inventory control
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Marquard

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is good but it is too noisy even with the lowest flow. Also, after a few cooking the cover on the filter starts to melt. I don`t know what the material is. It supposed to be heat resistance.
customer_reviews.author: bahrameba

customer_reviews.title: Not really any useful instructions
customer_reviews.text: Noisy works OK looks good . I wouldn’t use this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is a great value for the cost and has a beautiful, modern design. It was easy to install (only requires 1 bracket and 3 screws) and has good suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cho

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: The installation process was a bit rough and we had to get a few extra pieces for it to work but aside from that, it is an amazing product, it does help with strong smells in the kitchen and it surprisingly isn’t too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Campoverde

customer_reviews.title: Product is becoming noisy.
customer_reviews.text: week ago it was installed and now fan is making rattling noise, it does not make noise in beginning, when stove started to use, in few minutes its started to make rattling noise. What is remedy for this. do not like noise at all and later on started to vibrate like fan is not balanced. Cannot use because of this reason. Need solution to this problem from you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the money! It looks stylish and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia Gil

customer_reviews.title: Buy for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suction power glad I bought this and easy to clean. Im so glad I purchased this and super happy with the look and feel. The shipping was quick and the product did not arrive damaged! I definitely recommending purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Mine had a piece missing. Called amazon and got it replaced next day. Great price for an absolutely gorgeous piece for my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: ESTHER B.

customer_reviews.title: great product so far !!!
customer_reviews.text: awesome product easy to install ..suction is strong a bit noisy . would be great if it had a bit more support anti vibration support or layer to help with the suction force it provides !! Other than that this is a terrific range.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Measure your cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled my kitchen. This made it look amazing! Love it. fyi I didnt pay attention to sizing. May need a bit more space between cabinets than a standard size hood range. I measures 3ft. ( 36"inches)
customer_reviews.author: Alison F Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, only complaint is the time is only on military time.. not a deal breaker but not my like!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Car

customer_reviews.title: Good solid unit works well easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint was the protective film was a pain to remove in some spots as it was applied before the unit was assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds like a jet plane taking off. Very disappointed. LED lights are useless as well. Very dim.
customer_reviews.author: Dannyboo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Installed this hood while remodeling our kitchen. Install was very simple and straight forward. Love the easy to clean filters and the addition of the internal grease/oil catch on the motor. Would like for lights to have been brighter and the volume while running is about average.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks good , works well but clock will not set
customer_reviews.author: paul h velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The fan doesn’t lower, you have to turn the whole thing off to make it stop. Looks flimsy and fingerprints a lot. Lights are nice though. Disappointed and will be purchasing something else
customer_reviews.author: P.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: This makes my new kitchen look fabulous whenever someone comes in that’s the first thing they see. I receive so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Walls

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks Great! Easy to install! Need to send with Non-vented filters though!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly S. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent. Wish it had warmer looking LED lights rather than cold blue/white.
customer_reviews.author: DCG

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and modern
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance and the price is very affordable. The island cosmo is great! I highly recommend the item if your looking for something simple and modern. I would have liked for the light to have a range of brightness.
customer_reviews.author: socorro

customer_reviews.title: Great looking exhaust
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived fast and in well insulated box. No damages. Installation was o.k. I would have liked to seen a "COSMO" youtube video detailing instruction for specific unit. detailed could have had more details. Product works well and I am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Love this Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: My hubby and I installed this hood and I'm loving it right now. I'm using it ductless so I also bought the charcoal filters. Not hard at all to figure out...
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Cosmo hood vent as part of our kitchen remodel. We are very happy with the LED lights, 3-speed vent fan, sleek design, easy-to-clean filters, and quiet effective operation. The installation was easy. We think it looks great and at an excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Deane

customer_reviews.title: Returned before use-arrived slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Did not use it, but it looked like a fine quality product.
customer_reviews.author: LabDog48

product_meta.title: Cosmo COS-668AS750 Wall Mount Range Hood 380 CFM, Ductless Convertible Duct, Glass Chimney Over Stove Vent with Light, 3 Speed Exhaust, Fan Timer & Permanent Filter, 30, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:30| Style:Tempered Glass Visor / Digital Touch| Pattern Name:Range HoodAdd sleek and modern design to your home kitchen while removing smoke and odor. Cosmo’s COS-668AS750 wall mount range hood features a beautiful tempered glass visor and stainless steel body. 380 CFM of suction traps smoke and fumes from your kitchen. ARC-FLOW Permanent Filters are heavy duty, made of stainless steel and easy to clean; simply drop them into the dishwasher. The included glass visor captures smoke and steam, ensuring it doesn’t escape into your home. The included bright LED lights provide visibility while cooking. Soft touch digital controls make using your range hood a breeze to use. Trust Cosmo for your next luxury kitchen appliance
feature_bullets: MODERN EUROPEAN DESIGN: Modern styling to fit a variety of kitchen decors. Features easy-to-clean brushed stainless steel permanent filters, 3-speed motor, touch control panel and energy-efficient LED lighting

EFFICIENT AIRFLOW: 380 CFM removes smells and odors with ease for a clean kitchen; Only 65dB max noise level; Ducted range hood vents outside and away from your home; Optional Carbon Filter Kit available for ductless (Purchase Part # CFK1-TM)
SUPERIOR FILTRATION: Includes 2 matching dishwasher safe ARC-FLOW stainless steel permanent filters to trap cooking grease and oil. Save money on filters every year
TOUCH CONTROL PANEL: High-tech LCD touch control panel to manage multiple functions including 3 fan speeds and LED lighting for added visibility

5-YEAR LIMITED PARTS: Our customer support team is based proudly in the USA. Dimensions: 30 in. (W) x 18.5 in. (D) x Adjustable 21.5 in. - 39.2 in. (H). Electrical: 120V/60Hz, 3-prong plug. Duct Size: 6 in.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars241 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
